HediffDef.label: armbinder
HediffDef.description: An armbinder. A restraint device that binds the arms behind the body.

HediffDef.label: chastity belt
HediffDef.description: A chastity belt. Restricts access to the vagina and anus from its lover, and its wearer.

HediffDef.label: chastity cage
HediffDef.description: A chastity cage. Restricts access to the penis from its lover, and its wearer.

HediffDef.label: yoke
HediffDef.description: Keeps the arms and head of the wearer locked relative to their body in a raised-arm position.

HediffDef.label: closed gag
HediffDef.description: A closed gag that prevents its wearer from speaking.

HediffDef.label: open gag
HediffDef.description: An open gag that only allows its wearer to mutter incomprehensibly.

HediffDef.label: legbinder
HediffDef.description: An legbinder. A restraint device that binds the legs restricting movement.

HediffDef.label: blindfold
HediffDef.description: A blindfold. A restraint device that blocks the wearer's vision.
